name: bandaid
description: Slap a bandaid on it - the universal fix for everything

messages.self: You slap a bandaid on yourself. The ultimate act of self-care: acknowledging you have problems and covering them with adhesive medical strips.
messages.selfRoom: {actor} slaps a bandaid on themselves. It's unclear what they're fixing, but they seem satisfied with this solution.
messages.firstPerson: You slap a bandaid on {target}. "There! All better!" you declare, ignoring the laws of medicine, physics, and common sense.
messages.secondPerson: {actor} slaps a bandaid on you with reckless optimism. You're... pretty sure that's not where the problem is, but hey, free bandaid!
messages.thirdPerson: {actor} slaps a bandaid on {target} with the sort of misplaced confidence usually reserved for people who fix servers by turning them off and on again.
messages.untargeted: You slap a bandaid on yourself. That should fix... something. Probably. Maybe. Look, it's the thought that counts.
messages.untargetedRoom: {actor} slaps a bandaid on themselves with the confidence of someone who hasn't read the manual.
